summary: Skyforge Steel Armory complete weapon list ingame and fully upgradeable. Which makes Skyforge Steel standalone weapons which use their own model and textures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/6844-1-1330780804.jpg[/img][/center]


[color=red]--------------------------------------------------------
What This Mod Does
--------------------------------------------------------[/color]
After reading the loading screen which states \"Nobody knows who built the Skyforge, where the companions\' weapons are made. It\'s discovery led to the building of Jorrvaskr and the Companions as we know them today.\" countless times I thought to myself then why such powerful weapons look as unimportant as ordinary steel. If you have had the same thought then this mod is for you. 
This mod adds new custom models and textures made by me with borrowed elements from both the nord hero and steel weapon sets. Skyforge Steel weapons become standalone with this mod. Additionally the bow and quiver are still lacking to complete the first set still otherwise everything else is in end result. 
This set might not be everyone idea of skyforge steel but is that of my own and was designed for my personal taste. please leave a comment whether negative or positive I enjoy constructive criticism and feedback. Also If there is something you wish to see in a future texture set release send me a msg or leave a comment and I may consider the request. 

[center][color=yellow]If You Like This Mod Please Endorse It[/color][/center]

[color=red]--------------------------------------------------------
Features
--------------------------------------------------------[/color]

Adds Complete Skyforge Weapon Set:

- Battleaxe
- Greatsword
- War Hammer
- War Axe
- Sword
- Mace
- Dagger
- Bow
- Quiver
- Skyforge Steel and Nord Hero both can be crafted (only at the skyforge mind you) and tempered (Although Nord hero set lacks half the weapons skyforge set had)
- Skyforge steel set can be purchased from Eorlund in Whiterun


[color=red]--------------------------------------------------------
Plans For This Mod
--------------------------------------------------------[/color]

-Add various retextures for variety to the weapon set.
-Clean and Fix up some of the meshes
-Craft scabbards
-Add kyforge steel armor to game to match the weapon set

[color=red]--------------------------------------------------------
Installation Instructions
--------------------------------------------------------[/color]

Extract all files into Skyrim\'s Data folder.

[color=red]* WARNING *[/color] - if you have a mod that modifies the skyforge steel weapon set already installed in your game I advise to first uninstall that mod prior to installing this one to remove any conflicts they might have with your game.

[color=yellow]*Credits To *[/color]
creators of skyedit, nifscope, and fomm.
rage0976 for his original idea to seperate steel from skyforge steel
and Bethesda for making a great game 


[center][youtube]8kcLgMwBFFY[/youtube]
demo of mod in it\'s very very early state which shows where to craft these weapons.[/center]
[center][youtube]ZLIGmJDJPXA[/youtube]
Quick Video showing Black Steel Set[/center]
author: Propainaic
